svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Share who say they are 'very satisfied' or 'fairly satisfied' with their life
The full question asks: "On the whole are you very satisfied, fairly satisfied, not very satisfied or not at all satisfied
